document_data.name: Jorid
document_data.mainbody: '''Jorid''' was a barkeep in in the village of [[Toralth]] in [[Tethyr]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Jorid owned the [[Blue Badger Inn]], a tavern situated in Toralth in northeastern Tethyr.
document_data.History:
Before the [[Tethyrian Interregnum|Black Days]], Jorid trained in the Tethyrian army.

On [[Uktar 10]], 1370 DR, three [[Dwarf|dwarves]], [[Bapar Ghalmrin]], [[Odak Truesteel]], and [[Soram Battlebellow]], entered his taproom, seeking the ''[[Sondarr Scepter]]''. When [[Bramas Thorntree]] accused some of the other patrons of stealing it, this triggered a tavern brawl. Jorid was one of the ones who tried to separate and calm the brawlers.
